item.description:
Dear Boston Volunteers,

Emerson Umbrella Center for the Arts located in Concord, MA is looking for volunteers for the Earth Day. This is a good opportunity for our Boston volunteers to involve in field of art.

Be part of an amazing Earth Day event (festival, music, dancing, parade with larger than life puppets, River festival and more). Work behind the scenes and help make it happen. See http://www.emersonumbrella.org/musketaquid/earth-day/

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are seeking 5 volunteers for the event:

What: Earth Day Festival Clean Up

Stack tables and chairs for rental company to pick up

· Put away table cloths and craft boxes

· Pick up trash

Come early and enjoy the festivities.

When: Saturday, April 27th, 2013 from 2 pm to 330 PM

Where: Emerson Umbrella Center for the Arts, 40 Stow Street, Concord (Concord Center) MA

Close to the commuter rail with stops in Waltham, Cambridge, and Boston.

Parking Available-Co-ordiante ride on the event page if you dont have a car.

If not The commuter rail is about a 5 minute walk from our building and we have ample free parking. See http://www.mbta.com/schedules_and_maps/rail/lines/stations/?stopId=52 for more details.

Contact:Nancy Lippe inside the building or Kathy Warren, Volunteer Coordinator at kwarren@emersonumbrella.org or call 978.371.0820 if you are lost or need additional information.

NOTE: A firm commitment to the event is required. Please change your RSVP if you cannot attend the event.

Thanks

Phani

The Boston Volunteers

Big Enough to Deliver, Small Enough to Care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

Check out our Doggy Fun Run Fundraiser: www.doggyfunrun.org

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Earth Day-Clean up (Emerson Umbrella Center of Arts)
